duties_responsibilities.duty: Engage with guests to provide top-quality customer service and product education in a retail setting.
Contribute to a respectful and inclusive team environment, welcoming differences and celebrating diversity.
Execute market-relevant omnichannel programs to facilitate a seamless guest experience and enhance customer satisfaction.
Perform product presentation tasks and cleaning duties to maintain the luxury environment of the store.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma, GED, or equivalent
